"Everything that lives...
Everything that's ever lived...
All their wishes are gathering here."

"They're becoming a light to purify
the darkness... A Great Light..."

"There is nothing more left to say.
Just, I want to thank you for
fighting together with us."

"Even I don't want to see you
disappear. We're all going
home together, got that?!"

"No-one will be sacrificed this time.
Let's create a new future together...!"
